title: Mayo Chicken Recipe
description: Mayo chicken is a simple, tasty baked chicken dinner made with chicken pieces coated with garlic-herb mayonnaise and topped with Parmesan cheese.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Meat and Poultry Chicken Whole Chicken Recipes Mayo Chicken 4.6 (230) 205 Reviews 34 Photos This mayo chicken is my favorite chicken recipe, which I learned while doing low-carb dieting. I prefer dark meat, so I use 4 legs and thighs. You can make this recipe with pork chops as well. Submitted by Jim Richard Updated on November 13, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 34 34 34 34 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 1 hr 10 mins Total Time: 1 hr 25 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 whole chicken, cut into 6 pieces 1 cup mayonnaise 2 cloves garlic, crushed 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh rosemary 1 teaspoon salt freshly ground black pepper to taste ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place chicken pieces into a 9x13-inch baking dish. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir together mayonnaise, garlic, rosemary, salt, and black pepper in a bowl. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spread mayonnaise mixture over chicken; top with Parmesan cheese. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 1 hour and 10 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). I Made It Print 247 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 579 Calories 48g Fat 2g Carbs 34g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 579 % Daily Value * Total Fat 48g 62% Saturated Fat 10g 52% Cholesterol 117mg 39% Sodium 791mg 34% Total Carbohydrate 2g 1% Dietary Fiber 0g 0% Total Sugars 1g Protein 34g 67% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 96mg 7% Iron 2mg 10% Potassium 290mg 6% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Mayo Chicken 01 of 34 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 34 Photo by  LadyG 01/10/2024 This recipe is fantastic. I am low carb and this has become a “go-to” for me. Easy and tasty! I used skin on, bone in, chicken thighs, garlic powder equal to 4 cloves because I love garlic , oregano because I don’t like rosemary and 3/4 cup grated Parmesan. 03 of 34 Photo by  Ms Mo 06/05/2021 04 of 34 Photo by  Ms Mo 06/05/2021 05 of 34 Photo by  Wendy Thomas 05/04/2021 I made this tonight. I used boneless chicken breast and pounded them down a little. My husband and I loved it. My husband was skeptical at first when I told him what it was. But he really liked it. I highly recommend.. 06 of 34 Photo by  fabeveryday 06/18/2020 Super yummy and super easy! I made it with chicken breast tenders, and it was cooked to perfection in 30 minutes. So moist and delicious! 07 of 34 Photo by  Kim Culvey 05/11/2020 My family and I loved it! It had to cook longer than the stated time. It came out really moist. Definitely a great chicken dinner for the summer time! 08 of 34 Photo by  Melnal 05/11/2020 My husband LOVED this chicken. I made it exactly as the recipe dictated. It was rich tasting and packed full of flavor, and we are sharing This recipe with EVERYONE! 09 of 34 Photo by  fabu 04/28/2020 1 2 3 4 Next You’ll Also Love Dill Pickle Slow Cooker Whole Chicken 2 Ratings Grilled Chicken Under a Brick 1 Rating Pesto-Stuffed Chicken Breast 22 Ratings Molasses Baked Chicken 56 Ratings Chicken with 40 Cloves of Garlic 79 Ratings Perfect Baked Jerk Chicken 278 Ratings Orange Honey Garlic Chicken 192 Ratings Chicken Savoy 410 Ratings Jalapeño Chicken 130 Ratings Baked Slow Cooker Chicken 1,858 Ratings Amy's Amazing Baked Chicken Breasts 2 Ratings Bacon Wrapped Pesto Chicken 186 Ratings Simply Parmesan Chicken 470 Ratings Garlic Chicken Breasts 23 Ratings Slow Cooker Lemon Pepper Chicken 124 Ratings Slow Cooker Whole Chicken with Lemon 3 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Jim Richard
